name: figma-component-to-code
description: Convert Figma components to code with Claude AI

scripts.prebuild: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (!fs.existsSync('dist')) fs.mkdirSync('dist', { recursive: true });"
scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('dist')) fs.rmSync('dist', { recursive: true, force: true });"
